name: 黃正民

Week 5. z-Domain Analysis

Week 8. State Space Analysis
Week 9. Midterm Exam

Week 11. Digital Controllers Design using State-Space Methods
Week 12. Digital Observer Design
Week 13. Digital Observer Design

Week 16. Applications of Digital Control Systems

Week 18. Presentation of Final Project

Homework (with Matlab programming)                           30%

Final Project (paper survey with simulations or experiments) 35%
